description: Quotation Marks checklist compares quote counts between projects

expectedBehavior.quoteComparison: Compares quote counts, not quote text
expectedBehavior.quoteSettings: Uses project's QuotationMarkInfo for quote characters
expectedBehavior.filtering: Verses with no quotes in any project are excluded
expectedBehavior.nestedQuotes: Supports inner and inner-inner quote levels

verificationNotes: Requires quote settings to be complete (VAL-003)
Comparison is by count, not by matching text
Verses without any quotes are excluded (EC-006)
Different quote characters per project handled
